roleset.name: fall very fast

role.descr: end point, end state of arg1

example.name: another verb of quantifiable motion, you know the drill
example.text: Compaq Computer nose-dived $8.625 a share, to $100, and pulled other technology issues lower after reporting lower-than-expected earnings after the stock market closed Wednesday.

roleset.note: NOSEDIVE-V NOTES: Note that "nosedived" is a confirmation of the lexicalist hypothesisand Blocking--most people would say the past tense of "dived" is"dove", but "nosedive" is apparently no longer associated with"dive" and thus does not take the irregular past tense. Cool. (from nosedive.01-v)
